description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the Russell Top 200® Pure Value Index (the "underlying index").
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in the component securities that comprise the underlying index. The underlying index is composed of a subset of securities from the Russell Top 200® Index, which is composed of the largest 200 securities of the Russell 3000® Index, an index designed to measure the performance of the largest 3,000 companies in the U.S. equity market.
